title: 48 - An Albert Fish Production
description: On this week's My Favorite Murder (now with a stick of shitty gum!), Karen and Georgia recount the Starved Rock State Park murders and the mysterious ongoing kidnapping case of Sherri Papini.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
